title: Three Meals of a Reincarnator - Novel Updates
tags: Accelerated Growth   Alternate World   Antihero Protagonist   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Arrogant Characters   Calm Protagonist   Cruel Characters   Demon Lord   Demons   Dungeons   Fast Learner   Game Elements   Gods   Guilds   Handsome Male Lead   Lack of Common Sense   Level System   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Monsters   Multiple Realms   Overpowered Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Returning from Another World   Ruthless Protagonist   Second Chance   Strong to Stronger
author: Vega   베가
description:
After living in a desolate land, where there wasn't even a single blade of grass and hunger was an everyday reality, Min Sung finally returns to Earth: his home.

'Am I... back from the dead?'

Having lived off the remains of the monsters he had slain for a century, the food on Earth became a heavenly delicacy to him.

'Do NOT get between me and my meal!'

Judgment awaits those who disrupt the champion's meal.

Now, let the feast of the ultimate reincarnator begin!>
